subject: Team to review statement of Defence/Counter Claims of NHAI in all ongoing Arbitrations/ future Arbitrations.
text: "46 {b <b Ab; ?FH ?fG NLHA.L, CHAIRMAN; SE~iT. 3lalr;#0 x National Highways Authority of India DyIFTS No: NHAITRUcY GuxdeunesTosnaKabs[zoj97 Na 2. 1,32 /2020 d6T21.01zo2 f7i45 , I52 Date PareQIlcll9e9q It has been brought to my notice by CCIEs that in many cases before the Arbitral Tribunals (ATs) , even though NHAI had a strong legal basis to defend the claims, the full facts of the case were not brought out before the ATs, which have weakened the defence of NHAI: It may lead to varying amount of losses to NHAI in different cases. 2_ Therefore, henceforth, a team comprising of PD, CGM/RO, GM(T) of Tech Division at HQ & GM(Legal) shall review the Statement of Defence/ Counter-claims of NHAI in all ongoing arbitrations/ future arbitrations and certify to this effect. GM(Legal) may provide at least one (preferably two) YP(Legal) exclusively for each Tech Division at HQ to assist the above team: In case it is found at a later date that full facts of the case were not brought out in the above statements, action will be taken against the concerned team of officers for the laxity / connivance causing financial loss to NHAI: (Sukhbir Singh Sandhu) Chairman, NHAI 21.01.2020 All officers at HQRO/PIU
